# Learn about API authentication here: https://plot.ly/ggplot2/getting-started # Find your api_key here: https://plot.ly/settings/api library(plotly) test <- data.frame( test1 = sample(letters[1:2], 100, replace = TRUE), test2 = sample(letters[3:8], 100, replace = TRUE) ) ggplot(test, aes(x= test2, group = test1)) + geom_bar(aes(y = ..density.., fill = factor(..x..))) + facet_grid(~test1) + scale_fill_brewer(name = 'test2', breaks = 1:6, labels = levels(test$test2), palette = 'Set3') py$ggplotly()
